bio: Founder and President of Women Against Rape (W.A.R.) - an awareness group dedicated to raising awareness and counseling victims in the community. Published SongWriter: Gone prodiced by Paramount SongResearch Paper- Societal Views and Impacts of the Elderly population with Mental Disabilities. Published lyrics through Paramount Song- "Gone"Graduated Graduate School with a 3.95 GPAProfessors from my graduate program have used more than one of assignments as examples for new students and have incorporated some of my research into the classroom as well as their own research.

My availability is flexible but nights are usually easiest. I prefer payment through paypal and a written contract guaranteeing payment upon completion and acceptance of my work.  It is best to reach me via my persona email jessicah41287@verizon.net  but I may also be reached by my cell phone.
